SEARCH
Package io.brane.core.builder

Interface TxBuilder<T extends TxBuilder<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - the concrete builder type for fluent chaining
All Known Implementing Classes:
Eip1559Builder, LegacyBuilder
public sealed interface TxBuilder<T extends TxBuilder<T>> permits LegacyBuilder, Eip1559Builder
Fluent builder for constructing Ethereum transactions.

This sealed interface supports two transaction types:

  • LegacyBuilder - Pre-EIP-1559 transactions with gasPrice
  • Eip1559Builder - EIP-1559 transactions with dynamic fees

Example: 


 TransactionRequest tx = TxBuilder.eip1559()
     .from(sender)
     .to(recipient)
     .value(Wei.ether("1"))
     .maxFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(100))
     .maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(2))
     .build();
Since:
0.1.0-alpha

  • Method Details

    • from

      T from(Address address)
      Sets the sender address.

      The sender address is required for all transactions. Calling build() without setting a from address will result in incomplete transaction data that cannot be signed or submitted.

      Parameters:
      address - the sender address (must not be null)
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • to

      T to(Address address)
      Sets the recipient address. Null for contract deployment.
      Parameters:
      address - the recipient address, or null for contract creation
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • value

      T value(Wei value)
      Sets the value to transfer.
      Parameters:
      value - the amount of native currency to transfer
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • data

      T data(HexData data)
      Sets the transaction input data (calldata).
      Parameters:
      data - the encoded function call or contract bytecode
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • nonce

      T nonce(long nonce)
      Sets the transaction nonce.
      Parameters:
      nonce - the sender's transaction count
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • gasLimit

      T gasLimit(long gasLimit)
      Sets the gas limit.
      Parameters:
      gasLimit - the maximum gas to use
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • build

      TransactionRequest build()
      Builds the transaction request.
      Returns:

      Creates a new EIP-1559 transaction builder.
      Returns:
